group_1.narration: “These are some rambles by Nico Kanna…”
“I’ve survived and changed my image,@all for one reason alone...”
“So that until her tears,@spilled as she vanished into nothingness, can dry…”
“Until her mourning can finally cease,@the Seven Sisters will be by her side.”
“If she so desires to shine the light of reality upon me,@then I might as well take joy in such despair.”
“May the pretender return to darkness as such.”
“These are some rambles by Nico Kanna…no…”
“These are Nico Kanna’s grievances…”

group_1.textLeft: Let’s move swiftly with their freezing.

group_1.textRight: Here goes.

group_1.textLeft: Okay…
Hm?
What was that just now…?
What’s wrong?

group_1.textRight: …Nah, niente.

group_1.textCenter: Umika… Kaoru…@I’m gonna save you…I promise…
(I couldn’t apologize for making them@Magical Girls…)

group_1.textLeft: Michiru…are you okay?

group_1.textRight: I’m not okay…I feel so horrible.
I fought my own friends,@I took their Gems away…
Nothing makes sense to me anymore…
You’ll explain this to me, right?

group_1.textLeft: Nico here will tell you a story…
In the past, there was a deranged Magical Girl,@out of touch with her own self.
The girl had a liking for collecting gemstones.
“Let me show you my personal collection!”@...she would say.
“The single most precious gemstone is@the Soul Gem.”
“It’s the literal spark of life,@after all!”

group_1.textRight: So…she stole them from Magical Girls?

group_1.textLeft: Yep…the pinnacle of heresy,@a real foul hobby.
And then, the heretic girl,@in her “Gem picking”…
...was challenged to a fight by the Magical Girls of@Asunaro City.
Saki, Umika, Kaoru, Nico...
A group with an awful lot of short names@came together.

group_1.textRight: Are they…the original “Pleiades Saints”@Saki mentioned…?

group_1.textLeft: Non…
That name belonged to the heretics’ team.

group_1.textRight: The heretics…?@So she wasn’t alone?

group_1.textLeft: She was alone, but was also two…
She was a Magical Girl with multiple@personalities.
Their names were…@Luca Souju and Ayase Souju.
Each persona contracted with the white@fairy individually.
Which meant they had two Soul Gems.

group_1.textRight: So each of them made different contracts…

group_1.textLeft: That was the beginning of their heresy.
Luca of the white Gem,@wanted for herself one red…
Ayase of the red Gem,@wanted for herself one white…
Above everything and anyone, each desired@the other’s Gem the most.
But, it was not possible for them to exchange@their Gems between each other.
So they cried and cried, until they put them@both in a box, and it was wonderful.
There they started their collection of@insanity, in other words.

group_1.textRight: So because you steal Gems,
you call yourselves the “Pleiades Saints?”
But your goal is totally different from those girls.@Isn’t it bad having the same name?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, it’s an unpleasant title…
But, by bearing that unpleasant feeling…
It serves as our penance for our duty of@stealing Gems.

group_1.textRight: Why did you break up with Umika and Kaoru?

group_1.textLeft: Though we intended to keep the Souju’s Gems,
the two of them destroyed their Gems@without our consent.

group_1.textRight: And that made you part ways…
I’m sorry for making you relive such bad@memories…
But I’m really glad you talked to me…

group_1.textLeft: …Where’s Michiru?

group_1.textRight: She went to get her belongings.
She said it wouldn’t be right to stay at Umika’s@place anymore.

group_1.narration: ―Nico―@”The Magical Girl Hunters, Pleiades.”
―Nico―@A team of Gem thieves who took the heretic duo’s@wretched title unto themselves…
―Nico―@We told a wonderfully cruel lie there…
―Saki―@If we just openly told her that we were the Saints all along,@it’d only make her suffering worse.
―Nico―@A lie of compassion…@I don’t dislike the sound of that.
―Saki―@Let “Umika” and “Kaoru” rest alongside Kazumi Subaru.
―Nico―@Putting the copies of Umika and Kaoru@alongside the real Kazumi…
―Saki―@Just one lie after another again…
―Nico―@…Again, you say?
―Saki―@“I don’t need your kind lies anymore” Kazumi said…@And then it was all over.

group_1.textLeft: But I will not let it end this time.@My lies will get through this time…

group_1.textRight: There’s no turbulence ahead of our plans, yea?

group_1.textLeft: Of course, that’s precisely why I’m here.

group_1.textRight: Now that’s an Saki Asami thing to do…@Prudence to the highest degree.

group_1.narration: “We had abandoned this…”
“However, this isn’t the end…”
“Even if we…even if the copies are gone,@there is still hope…”
“That’s why…I’m counting…on you.”
